name: Student Mentorship Programme Portal, IIIT Delhi
desc: Developed a centralized web portal for the Student Mentorship Program (SMP), improving accessibility for over 700+ mentees and 100+ mentors.

name: Innovative Sensory Development Solutions
desc: Designed and tested sensory tools like 'The Tapper' and 'Raah', aimed at enhancing sensory development in children.

name: Digital Tuberculosis Screening Platform (WashKaro TB)
desc: Developed a TB screening data collection app, aiding in early detection and public health efforts, now published on the Google Play Store.

name: Advanced Gardening Companion Application (Gardeneer)
desc: Built an Android app for gardening enthusiasts to access knowledge, guidance, and community support for successful gardening.
